mapper.select: SELECT Machine_Name AS code, Machine_Signal AS machineSignal, PartsCount_Result AS cnc_products, ifnull( Override_Rapid, '0' ) AS cnc_rapidfeed, ifnull( Override_Spindle, '0' ) AS cnc_srate, Alarm_Message AS cnc_alarm_message, Machine_Mode AS cnc_mode, MainProgram_No AS cnc_mainproname, Tool_No AS cnc_toolnum FROM monitoring_list WHERE Machine_Name = #{name}
